channel.title: Authors on Academia
channel.description: Recent content in Authors on Academia

item.description:
Ishank Ramnath is an 8th-grade student at BASIS Cedar Park with a strong passion for video games, coding, and mathematics. He is an avid reader who is currently enjoying Brave New World by Aldous Huxley, a novel about futuristic society shaped by technological advancements.

Also, he is an active member of the Schoolhouse.org tutoring program, where he helps students of all ages and skill levels across a variety of subjects. Ishank has helped over a 150 students ranging form 22 different contries, in his journey tutoring.
